# Formula { #bambi.Formula }

```python
Formula(formula, *additionals)
```

Model formula

Allows to describe a model with multiple formulas. The first formula describes the response
variable and its predictors. The following formulas describe predictors for other parameters
of the response distribution, allowing distributional models.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

<code>[**formula**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[str](`str`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   A model description written using the formula syntax from the `formulae` library.

<code>[***additionals**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [tuple of str]{.parameter-annotation} [ = ]{.parameter-default-sep} [()]{.parameter-default}</code>

:   Additional formulas that describe model parameters rather than a response variable.

## Methods

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [check_additional](#bambi.Formula.check_additional) | Check if an additional formula matches the expected format |
| [check_additionals](#bambi.Formula.check_additionals) | Check if the additional formulas match the expected format |
| [get_all_formulas](#bambi.Formula.get_all_formulas) | Get all the model formulas |

### check_additional { #bambi.Formula.check_additional }

```python
Formula.check_additional(additional)
```

Check if an additional formula matches the expected format

#### Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

<code>[**additional**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[str](`str`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   A model formula that describes a model parameter.

#### Raises {.doc-section .doc-section-raises}

<code>[:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[ValueError](`ValueError`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   If the formula does not contain a response term.

<code>[:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[ValueError](`ValueError`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   If the response term is not a plain name.

### check_additionals { #bambi.Formula.check_additionals }

```python
Formula.check_additionals(additionals)
```

Check if the additional formulas match the expected format

#### Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

<code>[**additionals**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [sequence of str]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   Model formulas that describe model parameters rather than a response variable.

#### Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

<code>[**additionals**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [sequence of str]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   If all formulas match the required format, it returns them.

### get_all_formulas { #bambi.Formula.get_all_formulas }

```python
Formula.get_all_formulas()
```

Get all the model formulas

#### Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

<code>[]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [list of str]{.parameter-annotation}</code>
